name: Demetrius J. GRANT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
